metadata.title: CVE-2022-0425 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A DNS rebinding vulnerability in the Irker IRC Gateway integration in allversions of GitLab CE/EE since version 7.9 allows an attacker to triggerServer Side Request Forgery (SSRF) attacks.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'not maintainable').
